title: Environmental policy of the Joe Biden administration
added: In September 2021, the EPA planned to issue its final rule to reduce [[hydrofluorocarbon]] (HFC) emissions by 85% within 15 years. HFCs are greenhouse gases that are thousands of times more potent than {{CO2}}.<ref>{{Cite web|last=D'Angelo|first=Chris|date=2021-09-23|title=Biden Administration Finalizes Rule To Slash Super-Pollutant HFCs|url=https://www.huffpost.com/entry/hydrofluorocarbons-epa-final-rule-biden_n_614be8cfe4b098483a71b4a9|access-date=2021-09-23|website=HuffPost|language=en}}</ref>
